extends StockItem

        Construct a Book object with the specified characteristics
        Parameters:
        title - the CD title
        artist - the CD artist
        producer - the CD producer
        price - the list price of this CD
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if title is null, artist is null, author is null, or price is < 0
